name: PHProjectTypeDescriptionInvalidator
desc: A protocol that you use to tell the project when and how to invalidate type and footer text.

items.name: func invalidateTypeDescription(for: PHProjectType)
items.desc: Invalidates the type description for the given project type.

items.name: func invalidateFooterText(forSubtypesOf: PHProjectType)
items.desc: Invalidates the footer text for the subtypes of the given project type.
